parameters.responseBody: {{ { error: 'Missing required fields: id, tenantId', success: false } }}

parameters.query: UPDATE questionnaires SET {{ $json.leadId !== undefined ? "lead_id = " + ($json.leadId ? "'" + $json.leadId + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} {{ $json.callLogId !== undefined ? "call_log_id = " + ($json.callLogId ? "'" + $json.callLogId + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} {{ $json.title !== undefined ? "title = '" + $json.title + "'," : "" }} {{ $json.description !== undefined ? "description = '" + $json.description + "'," : "" }} {{ $json.content !== undefined ? "content = '" + JSON.stringify($json.content).replace(/'/g, "''") + "'::jsonb," : "" }} {{ $json.status !== undefined ? "status = '" + $json.status + "'," : "" }} {{ $json.completedAt !== undefined ? "completed_at = " + ($json.completedAt ? "'" + $json.completedAt + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '{{ $json.id }}' AND tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenantId }}'
